Uses of Class
tripleplay.ui.layout.TableLayout.Column

  • Packages that use TableLayout.Column 
    Package Description
    tripleplay.ui.layout  

    • Uses of TableLayout.Column in tripleplay.ui.layout

      Fields in tripleplay.ui.layout declared as TableLayout.Column 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static TableLayout.Column TableLayout.COL
      The default column configuration.
      Methods in tripleplay.ui.layout that return TableLayout.Column 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      TableLayout.Column TableLayout.Column.alignLeft()
      Left aligns cells.
      TableLayout.Column TableLayout.Column.alignRight()
      Right aligns cells.
      static TableLayout.Column[] TableLayout.columns(int count)
      Creates an array of columns columns, each with default configuration.
      TableLayout.Column[] TableLayout.Column.copy(int count)
      Returns count copies of this column.
      TableLayout.Column TableLayout.Column.fixed()
      Sets column to always use the width of its widest element.
      TableLayout.Column TableLayout.Column.free(float weight)
      Sets column to grow freely when excess width is available.
      TableLayout.Column TableLayout.Column.minWidth(float minWidth)
      Configures the minimum width.
      TableLayout.Column TableLayout.Column.stretch()
      Sets column to stretch the width of its elements to the column width.
      Constructors in tripleplay.ui.layout with parameters of type TableLayout.Column 
      Constructor and Description
      TableLayout(TableLayout.Column... columns)
      Creates a table layout with the specified columns.
